GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of one article depending on article_id searched

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves and object of all comments for the article searched

exampleResponse.body: The owls are not what they seem.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the the chosen article
